get.summary: Resolves and redirects a provided Audius app URL to the API resource URL it represents
get.description:
This endpoint allows you to lookup and access API resources when you only know the
audius.co URL.
Tracks, Playlists, and Users are supported.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to resolve. Either fully formed URL (https://audius.co) or just the absolute path

get.description: Gets the most recent tips on the network

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip. Useful for pagination (page number * limit)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to fetch

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID of the user making the request

parameters.name: receiver_min_followers
parameters.description: Only include tips to recipients that have this many followers

parameters.name: receiver_is_verified
parameters.description: Only include tips to recipients that are verified

parameters.name: current_user_follows
parameters.description: Only include tips involving the user's followers in the given capacity. Requires user_id to be set.

parameters.name: unique_by
parameters.description:
Only include the most recent tip for a user was involved in the given capacity.

Eg. 'sender' will ensure that each tip returned has a unique sender, using the most recent tip sent by a user if that user has sent multiple tips.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID of the user making the request

get.summary: Download the original or MP3 file of a track
get.description: Download an original or mp3 track

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: A Track ID

parameters.name: user_signature
parameters.description:
Optional - signature from the requesting user's wallet.
        This is needed to authenticate the user and verify access in case the track is gated.

parameters.name: user_data
parameters.description: Optional - data which was used to generate the optional signature argument.

parameters.name: nft_access_signature
parameters.description:
Optional - nft access signature for this track which was previously generated by a registered DN.
        We perform checks on it and pass it through to CN.

parameters.name: original
parameters.description: Optional - true if downloading original file

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Optional - name of file to download. If not provided, defaults to track original filename or title.

get.summary: Inspects the details of the file for a track
get.description: Inspect a track

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: A Track ID

parameters.name: original
parameters.description: Optional - if set to true inspects the original quality file

get.summary: Get the streamable MP3 file of a track
get.description:
Stream an mp3 track
This endpoint accepts the Range header for streaming.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Range_requests

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: A Track ID

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: Optional - true if streaming track preview

parameters.name: user_signature
parameters.description:
Optional - signature from the requesting user's wallet.
        This is needed to authenticate the user and verify access in case the track is gated.

parameters.name: user_data
parameters.description: Optional - data which was used to generate the optional signature argument.

parameters.name: nft_access_signature
parameters.description:
Optional - gated content signature for this track which was previously generated by a registered DN.
        We perform checks on it and pass it through to CN.

parameters.name: skip_play_count
parameters.description: Optional - boolean that disables tracking of play counts.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Optional - API key for third party apps. This is required for tracks that only allow specific API keys.

parameters.name: skip_check
parameters.description: Optional - POC to skip node 'double dip' health check

get.summary: POC: An alternate form of the /stream url
get.description:
Fetch the CN url for a track stream
Instead of redirecting to the content node, it just returns the url as a string
This means the client can pre-fetch the url

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: A Track ID

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: Optional - true if streaming track preview

parameters.name: user_signature
parameters.description:
Optional - signature from the requesting user's wallet.
        This is needed to authenticate the user and verify access in case the track is gated.

parameters.name: user_data
parameters.description: Optional - data which was used to generate the optional signature argument.

parameters.name: nft_access_signature
parameters.description:
Optional - gated content signature for this track which was previously generated by a registered DN.
        We perform checks on it and pass it through to CN.

parameters.name: skip_play_count
parameters.description: Optional - boolean that disables tracking of play counts.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Optional - API key for third party apps. This is required for tracks that only allow specific API keys.

tags.name: dashboard_wallet_users
tags.description: Protocol dashboard wallet users related operations

wallet.description: The user's Ethereum wallet address for their account

access.description: Describes what access the given user has

user_id.description: The user ID of the owner of this track

blocknumber.description: The blocknumber this track was last updated

is_stream_gated.description: Whether or not the owner has restricted streaming behind an access gate

stream_conditions.description: How to unlock stream access to the track

is_download_gated.description: Whether or not the owner has restricted downloading behind an access gate

download_conditions.description: How to unlock the track download

tip_user_id.description: Must tip the given user ID to unlock

follow_user_id.description: Must follow the given user ID to unlock

usdc_purchase.description: Must pay the total price and split to the given addresses to unlock

nft_collection.description: Must hold an NFT of the given collection to unlock

ParseError.description: When a mask can't be parsed

MaskError.description: When any error occurs on mask
